name: Avery Johnson
summary: Results-driven Data Analyst with 4 years of experience in the retail sector. Proficient in leveraging Tableau to extract insights and drive business decisions. Dedicated to transforming raw data into actionable strategies for growth.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Senior Data Analyst
experience.description: Led the development of interactive Tableau dashboards that increased sales by 15%. Conducted in-depth market analysis to optimize product pricing strategies.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Utilized advanced SQL queries to streamline inventory management, reducing stock shortages by 20%. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve customer segmentation.

projects.name: Customer Segmentation Project
projects.description: Segmented customer base using Tableau to personalize marketing campaigns, resulting in a 10% increase in customer engagement. Implemented predictive analytics models to forecast customer behavior.

projects.name: Inventory Optimization Project
projects.description: Optimized inventory levels using SQL queries and Tableau visualizations, reducing excess stock by 25% while maintaining customer satisfaction levels. Improved demand forecasting accuracy by 15%.
